Universiti Malaya: The University of Malaya (Malay: Universiti Malaya; abbreviated as UM or informally the Malayan University) is a public research university located in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. It is the oldest and highest ranking Malaysian institution of higher education,[6][7] and was the only university in newly independent Malaya.[8] The university has graduated five prime ministers of Malaysia, and other political, business, and cultural figures of national prominence.
